segments.text: The sunlight streaming through the window creates a beautiful contrast with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire how calm the outside world looks while disaster looms close.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I notice the woman, completely unaware of the water pooling around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how focused she is on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my amusement shifts to worry as I glance over at the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching dangerously for those cookies, and I feel a wave of anger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How could he be so reckless?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl alongside him is eagerly expecting a cookie, her hand reaching out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a simple act, yet I can’t help but feel disgusted by their sneakiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to intervene, but they seem so absorbed in their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR
